title: Jennifer Aniston looks adorable in throwback pic as she makes Instagram debut

Jennifer Aniston has finally made herself an Instagram account.

The actress, who starred in hit sitcom Friends, has given fans an adorable throwback pic to her younger days, comparing it to what she looks like now.

The black and white snap shows young Jennifer staring at the camera with a straight face, wearing a printed hat that was too big for her head.

And in the photo of the star now, she pulled the same face but appears visibly older - although she looks as youthful as ever at 50-years-old.

The star literally looks as if she hasn't aged a day - she still has the same baby face and expression as the younger snap.

Jen is glowing in the second snap, her skin is ultra soft Hollywood style and her blue eyes pop.

"#TBT In style, then and now..." the award-winning actress penned.

(Image: Instagram)

Jen, who rose to fame as Rachel Green on the sitcom, teased a Friends reunion on Instagram.

She blew everyone away with her first ever post.

The star racked up more than 11 million followers in just one day, thanks to that epic selfie of her and the gang.

(Image: Instagram)

In the snap, Jenifer poses up with Lisa Kudrow (Phoebe Buffay), Matthew Perry (Chandler Bing), Courteney Cox (Monica Gellar), Matt LeBlanc (Joey Tribbiani) and David Schwimmer (Ross Gellar).

She captioned it: "And now we’re Instagram FRIENDS too. HI INSTAGRAM"

And it seems Jen explained the picture before it had even gone viral.

Speaking on The Howard Stern Show on October 7, she said: "We just had dinner this week the whole gang."

Howard asked: "Everyone was there? Why? Is that something that is unusual or..?"

Jen explained: "No, it's just Schwimmer was in town and we all happened to have a window of time so we got together."

(Image: Instagram)

Howard probed Jen to find out more about the on-screen Friends, asking: "You really like them?"

She said: "Oh my God, we laughed so hard, yes."

Howard then asked if no one in the crew annoys her.

She said: "Not one, lightning in a bottle."
description: She shared the snap after racking up 13million followers since creating an account
